message: In the legal world, the competition can be fierce. Setting yourself apart in a way that displays your expertise, while creating an engaging space for clients can feel impossible. But look no further! Video is your answer. This webinar will explore just how video can work for you in your  practice, walking you through how to’s for video strategy, production, and use.

You’re invited to join guest speaker Robert Weiss as he shares a comprehensive way to use video to your law firm’s advantage through strategic planning. Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday March 1, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!

message: Reminder: You are registered for Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy on Friday, March 1, 2024 at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT.
